message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $120. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my original price. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I can offer $105 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
